permissions: Admins can delete prediction subjects. Non-admin users can delete prediction subjects only when they are admin members of the associated broker.
side_effects: Deletes the prediction subject and dependent records (memberships, gaps, agents, recaps, and lowest losing bid details) when allowed. Deletion is blocked if the subject has predictions.
validation_notes: The prediction subject ID argument is required. --confirm is required. The prediction subject cannot be deleted when it has predictions.
